long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How It Works:

üí∏ Earn: Get up to 20% of your purchase value as cash back via PayPal. You can rack up serious savings when you shop fashion, travel, and more!

ü§ù Support a Cause: For any cash back you earn, AllGives will donate the same amount to a cause you care about.

üîî Never Miss a Deal: Add our extension, and we'll remind you to activate deals when you shop at hundreds of stores. Get money back and raise some serious donations with just one click!

Why Use AllGives?

üìà Unbeatable Rates Guaranteed: Our cash back rates are 3x higher on average than others. If you find a better public offer on another site, let us know and we'll beat it - guaranteed.
